extendedInfo.description: Take Invest in America with you wherever you go!Credit union members can access Invest in America's exclusive discount offers through this easy-to-use app.  Members can save money from companies like GM, Sprint, TurboTax, and Dell. What the Invest in America app can do:- Sprint Verification Tool â members that are new or current Sprint customers can validate their credit union membership and start saving with Sprint right away!- Discount Finder â for members looking to save with Sprint or GM, this lets you find the Sprint store or GM dealership closest to you.- Credit Union Finder â locate a credit union near you or anywhere in the U.S. with this tool. It also gives you credit union details like location, phone, map and a link to its website.Plus, you can easily get to LoveMyCreditUnion.org where you can find even more credit union member discounts.

reviews.title: Still too blurry on note2
reviews.comment: Its still tooooo blurryy.. they should hire someone who has a functioning camera app or something....
reviews.author: keleon Rockett

reviews.title: Focus...
reviews.comment: The focus on htc one doesn\'t work at all. Getting a clear picture is the only way to ensure a discount, so why not fix that issue asap.
reviews.author: Andrew Buss

reviews.title: Blurry camera
reviews.comment: How about No Stars... can\'t get a clear pic on my Galaxy S4. Not even a little useful. Thanks for downloading this in the store Sprint tech, still have to drive 30 mins back to the store to try again. Boo!
reviews.author: Cheryl Tice

reviews.title: Camera still doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Nice to see that the camera focus issue has been fixed for  Galaxy owners.... Now how about the rest of us?
reviews.author: Bill Porter

reviews.title: Seems to work
reviews.comment: I downloaded the app to get a discount on my sprint plan and everything seem to go through just fine. If it shows up on the billing statement I will be satisfied.
reviews.author: Lem Gaswint

reviews.title: Can\'t even read the pics!
reviews.comment: I know it\'s not my camera, because it works. But every time I take a picture it\'s so blurry you can\'t even read it and the submissions always get denied! Fix and I\'ll change the rating. Until then this is horrible and useless.
reviews.author: Dakota Mecham

reviews.title: Too blurry/block numbers
reviews.comment: Continues to ask me to block out my numbers. Figure it\'s because it\'s too blurry. Also using HTC One. Please fix.
reviews.author: Michelle Alt

reviews.comment: Camera focus does not work so unable to get discount.  Worthless.
reviews.author: damien Caponi

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: How am I supposed to get the discount when I can\'t complete the process???
reviews.author: Kendric Nation

reviews.title: Ridiculous app
reviews.comment: I\'ve applied online and on this stupid app.and still nothing. ..
reviews.author: Ericka Garner

reviews.title: Blurry!
reviews.comment: Camera won\'t focus!
reviews.author: Thomas Brown

reviews.title: blury on HTC One
reviews.comment: App gets to the right person but I got a text telling me that it is too blury to confirm. Camera is really nice. but not using this app.
reviews.author: Robin Kent

reviews.title: Worthless
reviews.comment: It amazes me how simple this could be if only the camera part worked. There aren\'t many apps that have driven me as crazy as this one. DON\'T BOTHER.
reviews.author: Trey Doyle

reviews.title: Needs to be fixed!
reviews.comment: Would love if camera focus issues were fixed for HTC One. App is almost unusable for me.
reviews.author: Alec Mistak

reviews.title: Camera
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t focus. Where\'s the fix?!?!?!
reviews.author: Anthony Morgan

reviews.comment: Great app
reviews.author: Eddy Garcia

reviews.title: Focus!
reviews.comment: Focus doesn\'t work on htc one
reviews.author: Anthony Montoya

reviews.title: filled out the app. info
reviews.comment: said i would recieve a phone call i\'m waiting i don\'t get it i already had the approval and they turned it off what a pain
reviews.author: Nick Lopez

reviews.title: Useless App
reviews.comment: Downloading this app was a total wast of my time. Never would I have imagined I would prefer to fill out a paper form and submit it than to submit my info easily via a website or phone app. After trying multiple times to verify my credit union membership without success I have given up and will be uninstalling this piece of crap app.
reviews.author: AnTrelle Brown

reviews.title: Don\'t Bother!
reviews.comment: I saw the bad reviews, accepted it as a challenge. Mistake made by me. I made it through till the end TWICE and it closed on me both times. Trash.
reviews.author: Mark Lawler
